Subject: Serer IP does not resolve via dns load balance url
Description: Hi team, We have Dns load balance for ISP link on our promises. Dns load balance url does not resolve on client server ip. Link :- dlp.bkt-tires.com
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter an issue with the IP of the EPP server .
They have a DNS load balancer that is not resolving the Server IP .
Next_Steps__c: We will schedule a remote session to check the configuration.
Solution_Comment__c: We had a remote session where we fix the issue that the customer had .
